entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 21.
